org.usfirst.frc.team263.robot

Class MecanumDrive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team263.robot.MecanumDrive

  • public class MecanumDrive
extends java.lang.Object
    Drivebase code for a mecanum drivebase. Supports field-centric and non-oriented driving methods.
    Since:
    01-20-17
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dan Waxman

      • MecanumDrive

        public MecanumDrive(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController frontRight,

                    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SpeedController backLeft,
                    com.kauailabs.navx.frc.AHRS gyro,
                    double driftConstant)
        Construct instance of drivebase code with appropriate motor controllers to be addressed.
        Parameters:
        frontRight - front right wheel motor controller
        backRight - back right wheel motor controller
        frontLeft - front left wheel motor controller
        backLeft - back left wheel motor controller
        gyro - AHRS device to read yaw from
        driftConstant - proportionality constant for angle drift of drivebase

    • Method Detail

      • drive

        public void drive(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.XboxController controller,
                  boolean fieldCentric)
        Method to drive a mecanum drivebase off of Xbox Controller input with field-centric controls and rotational closed system feedback.

        This method is field oriented, meaning that a control direction is absolute to the field's Cartesian plane.

        Also offers closed loop rotational feedback system.

        Refer to drive(Xbox controller) for non-field oriented controls.

        Parameters:
        controller - Xbox controller to input drive controls
        fieldCentric - true if field centric controls, false otherwise.
